programme.title: Mitchell Pehlke Lacrosse Show
programme.desc: Welcome to Episode 24 of the Mitchell Pehlke Lacrosse Show presented by Duke Cannon! Jules Heningburg joins the show to talk all-star weekend, his broadcasting career, and his best stories from his PLL career, which after this episode taped, has added a new chapter to it. Doogs gives his who should the mvp be should've been top 5 WLL players. Chapt GPT James Hogan breaks down the college transfer portal, and Mitch ranks the top-3 high schoolers that will take over the lacrosse world in the near future. Will anyone take down Kev in ball knower of the week?

programme.title: Season 21 WPT Big One for One Drop- Part 3
programme.desc: Professional poker action from a series of international tournaments.

programme.title: Season 21 WPT Big One for One Drop- Part 4
programme.desc: Professional poker action from a series of international tournaments.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Hasan Alghanim opens the show in a barn burner against Dalton Shtybel, then Chad Lucanas fights Trai Santos, Stan Surmacz vs Reuben Roundstone, Jermiah Riggs vs Sonny Smith, and finally rounding out this hour with a war between Jade Masson-Wong and Gabrielle Roman.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Miami never disappoints, and these four bouts emphasize the talent coming out of the Sunshine State. Suarez vs Williamson, Meyer vs Famez and Davis vs Wilson take place in the Magic City along with women's flyweight scrap between Rodriguez & Franco.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: In a series of brutal showings, Miami's best up and coming prospects along with potential contenders square up and spill blood in the Squared Circle.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Three cherry-picked battles from a historic card in Bulgaria featuring some of Europe's greatest bare-knuckle contenders.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Albuquerque is known for breeding some warriors in the world of combat sports, and now you can officially add bare-knuckle into that mix. John Dodson gets his first ever blood and guts challenge for flyweight gold against Dagoberto Aguero.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: The 505 hosted an epic BKFC 59 and here are three of some of the greatest battles from the evening. Watch Felipe Chavez vs Leandro Torres, Justin Street vs Anthony Sanchez and Keith Richardson vs Frank Lester!

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: A collection of UK battles including two UK title fights. Watch Christie vs. Round, Tenaglia vs. Lilley, Hodgson vs. Wasserman and Cooke vs. Oskar in fights of attrition in England.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Milton Keynes is one of several European homes for the BKFC and for good reason. The city never disappoints and the fighters throw down.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Clearwater, Florida is in competition with Miami for showcasing electrifying matchups and bare-knuckle talent. A unique venue hosts Richman vs Lozano in the main event, Fortt vs. Brito in the co-main and Ridge vs. Randall.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Angel Hernandez vs. Rayne Wells, Jessica Borga vs. Katharina Lehner, Jay Jackson vs. Idrees Wasi and Abdiel Velazquez vs. Travis Thompson help kick off a nine-fight Fight Night in Clearwater, Florida.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Some of the most dominant performances from KnuckleMania IV. Mike Perry headlines against Thiago Alves, Lorenzo Hunt looks to make history against heavyweight champ Mick Terrill, Jeremiah Riggs welcomes Alfredo Angulo to the Squared Circle.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Knuckle Up is where grit meets glory: Dakota Cochrane vs. Will Santiago is a clash of veterans with knockout power and something to prove. Brennan Ward vs. James Dennis are two aggressive brawlers who collide in a wild, fast-paced slugfest.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Some of the most dominant performances from KnuckleMania IV. Mike Perry headlines against Thiago Alves, Lorenzo Hunt looks to make history against heavyweight champ Mick Terrill, Jeremiah Riggs welcomes Alfredo Angulo to the Squared Circle.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Before the halfway point of the evening, Los Angeles had already put on a phenomenal show. Complete with upsets, dominance and five-round bangers.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: In a historic and first ever trip to Connecticut's Mohegan Sun Casino, Natalie Gage vs. Sarah Click, Rick Hawn vs. Stephen Stengel, Mike Trizano vs. Louie Lopez and Jimmie Rivera vs. Daniel Straus make an outstanding account for BKFC talent.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up

programme.title: World Series of Poker

programme.title: World Series of Poker
programme.desc: The $5,000 Seven Card Stud World Championship attracted 144 entrants and created a prize pool of $676,800. programme.title: World Series of Poker

Who will win the $270,420 first-place prize and prestigious WSOP bracelet?

programme.title: World Series of Poker

programme.title: Poker Masters

programme.title: Klippers
programme.desc: After a loan shark hires a hitman to kill his ex-wife in exchange for debt erasal, the job quickly becomes more complicated than anyone thought.

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: A former felon looking for redemption tries to steer inner-city kids away from crime by forming an unconventional chess club in Washington, DC.

programme.title: Being on Top
programme.desc: Four women, Sophia Simmons, Dylan Carter, Portia Fitzgerald and Bridgette Barlow, who at the height of their careers are leaders in their industry, discover that having it all is easier said than done. Faced with the challenge of wanting both a professional and a personal life, they realize that life at the top can at times be isolating, and require sacrificing the authority and control they've earned professionally.

programme.title: It Ain’t Easy
programme.desc: Mack is the son of a prostitute, and has picked up the trade of becoming a pimp, until he decides to seek revenge on his enemy, Memphis Slim.

programme.title: The Love We Had
programme.desc: After one decision destroys the life of a young couple, it continues to ruin their other relationships and everything they hold sacred.

programme.title: Nine Lives
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity thrusts a former Special Forces agent suffering from PTSD back into the world of treachery he has tried to leave behind.

programme.title: Endless Summer
programme.desc: A man who has been dreaming of the love of his life has one last day to be noticed by her, but his obnoxious family and her boyfriend get in the way.

programme.title: Five Nights in Maine
programme.desc: After his wife’s tragic death, Sherwin is called to Maine to care for his dying and estranged mother-in-law and confront a lifetime of disagreement.

programme.title: The Best Thing!
programme.desc: A restaurateur discovers his deceased ex-girlfriend may have had his child.

programme.title: Stock Option

programme.title: 1-800 Missing
programme.desc: After his daughter goes missing, Kevin Townsend, an undercover cop, makes it his mission to save her and the missing children of Chicago.

programme.title: 10 Kilos in the Trunk
programme.desc: When her friend gets locked up, Monica agrees to deliver a very important package in the trunk of her car, but a series of obstacles gets in the way.

programme.title: Kinfolk
programme.desc: Eboni is a hair stylist dreaming of owning a successful salon in her hometown, with the support of her half-siblings Beau and Hillary. Things get complicated when their father attempts to reconcile for the past.

programme.title: Sugar Daddy Killer
programme.desc: Sasha has just ended a relationship with her boyfriend and is looking for a fresh start. Her friend Tonya tells her she needs to get a Sugar Daddy to forget about her boyfriend, and get her bills paid. Sasha starts dating a Sugar Daddy and decides she is going to scam him. When Sasha's Sugar Daddy wants more than conversation, she is forced to kill him. Now Sasha decides to start killing one Sugar Daddy after the next to get all the money she can.

programme.title: Judge Knott
programme.desc: Pulled over for a traffic stop, a veteran judge finds the situation going from bad to worse when the cops kidnap his young daughter.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: A young woman with political and social-justice aspirations finds herself trying to survive on the streets of Atlanta after running away from home.

programme.title: Priceless: The Score
programme.desc: After starting their new record label, Donica Blair and Shequell Harris have entered a dangerous arena full of guns, lies, and deceit. Now they are racing against time to right their wrongs and save their own lives before they are next in a string of murders. Meanwhile their partner Seven, has fallen victim to the deadliest of them all; the Black widow.

programme.title: Runway of Shadows
programme.desc: Sisters Ivy and Zara are separated at a very young age due to their father's deceit. When Ivy and Zara unexpectedly cross paths at a prestigious runway show, the stage it set for a series of mysterious and unsettling events.

programme.title: The Devil Came to Duval
programme.desc: After surviving a suicide attempt, comedian Eli Thompson faces his past on his birthday, but a night out at the bar spirals into chaos when the Devil arrives. Eli must confront betrayal, revenge, and supernatural terror to survive.

programme.title: Troubled Mystic
programme.desc: Tracie is a single mother who meets Corey Daniels, the calculated and "perfect guy" looking for his next perfect family to manipulate by any means necessary.

programme.title: Vegas Vixens
programme.desc: Detectives unravel the murder of a Vegas escort, uncovering buried secrets and exposing a sprawling criminal empire in the city's underbelly.

programme.title: My Husband's Mistress
programme.desc: Behind the glamorous facade of the aviation industry, a dirty betrayal unfolds. A devoted wife's world is shattered when she discovers her husband's affair with her best friend. As the truth unravels, a battle for love, revenge, and survival ensues.

programme.title: Single, Saved and Searching
programme.desc: After a devastating breakup, a woman sends a prayer to God and is granted the ability to make men appear at her will.

programme.title: Bottle Girl
programme.desc: Diamond's dream of going to college is threatened by financial hardship. A desperate job at a glamorous Atlanta lounge exposes her to a world of temptation and danger.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Lost and grieving, Chris seeks solace in the wrong crowd. A chance encounter with the enigmatic Patrick leads him down a dangerous path, forcing him to confront his own morality and the consequences of his choices.

programme.title: My Man
programme.desc: Trina, a young model, becomes entangled with Max. As their relationship deepens, she uncovers his dark secrets: a double life, a psychotic ex-girlfriend, and a dangerous obsession. When Trina crosses a line, she becomes the target of a deadly game of cat and mouse. Betrayal, madness, and murder ensue as the lines between love, obsession, and survival blur.

programme.title: Quiet as Kept
programme.desc: Jay is unlawfully detained. His ex-girlfriend returns, and his business partners work to clear his name. Meanwhile, a crooked cop is under suspicion for murder, and connections are made between him and Jay. Torn between duty and loyalty, Detective Johnson is caught in the middle. As the prosecution struggles, Jay and his business partners work to exist the dangerous world cleanly.

programme.title: Father Knows Best
programme.desc: Raised by a controlling father, Zoe battles trauma and a life of crime, yearning for spiritual peace while trapped in a cycle of violence and fear.

programme.title: Curfew: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Former police captain Thomas Cooper, once a respected figure, finds himself entangled in a dangerous deal with a notorious crime boss. His involvement leads to a love triangle and ultimately a betrayal. Now, haunted by his past, Thomas must confront the consequences when his son, Christian, becomes a target of the crime boss's revenge.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: A drug kingpin looking to expand his empire finds the venture to be much harder than he anticipated when he lacks support amidst the chaos.

programme.title: Toxic Friendz
programme.desc: Fed up with the status quo, a woman reluctantly attends her coworker's Halloween party, where secrets are revealed and things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: On The Nightcap we explore and question other lifestyles and cultures with an enthusiastic, open mind and hope to leave our viewers happily pondering new perspectives. The show's unique set has a full bar with a rotating cast of bartenders pouring up unique cocktails you can try to replicate at home. Whether it's inviting the most provocative guests to the signature pink couch or hearing your take on controversial topics, the conversations never disappoint. From game night to ordering in munchies, The Nightcap will keep you wanting more. It's sexy, it's risqué, it's everything you wouldn't expect from late-night TV.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason are escorting prisoners to Leavenworth prison when a stranger begins following along behind.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and the beautiful prisoner he is transporting are on a three day trip while her partner is still on the loose. For once Josh may not follow through on obeying the law as they fall in love.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

programme.desc: Dan’s ready to share his feelings with Louise; Darlene realizes how badly she wants a baby.

programme.title: The Conners

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene and Ben hunt for apartments; Jackie, Becky, and Beverly Rose road trip to Mexico to meet her father; Dan confides financial woes to Louise.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners are dealing with the pandemic and life's financial troubles; the Lunch Box is closed for everything but takeout and delivery.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mary is devastated that Halloween has been canceled by the city, so Darlene and Becky enlist Jackie and the rest of the family to create an unforgettable experience.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene isolates herself from her co-workers at Wellman Plastics, leaving them with the impression she is an elitist snob.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: It's Beverly Rose's first birthday -- but it's not all cake and candles -- when Becky and Emilio disagree on what kind of party they should have.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene's friendship with a manager at Wellman Plastics lands her in an awkward situation; Louise's brother tries to win over Jackie.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris's job is in jeopardy after joining a protest she strongly believes in, leading to tense discussions within the family.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Ben's mom arrives after an unexpected death and unveils shocking information from the past; Becky and Emilio spend more time together.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Harris brings home her new friend, Josh, leaving the family questioning his intentions; Becky and Ben's attempt to build a closet stirs up family drama.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene earns a promotion at Wellman Plastics, while Ben decides on a new career path; Jackie tries an herbal tea. and it leads to an emotional revelation.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Chuck's new purchase of a boat creates a rift; Darlene hires her first assistant at Wellman's Plastics but soon realizes she is anything but helpful.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene starts to feel the pressures of her new job; Dan attempts to help Ben out at the hardware store, but the two don't always agree on how to run the business.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark is convinced he has COVID-19; Becky and Harris team up to confront Josh, who has been 'ghosting' Harris.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan feels helpless when Louise refuses to let him put himself at risk for her; when Jackie learns the competing restaurants are posting negative reviews.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Becky meets up with an old friend and feels pressured to impress him; Dan questions his position at the hardware store, leading to a massive fight between him and Ben.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Becky is working double shifts and taking classes at the community college, resulting in less time with her daughter; Dan decides to foster an elderly dog.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene learns shocking news about a friend; the Conners family comes together to help someone close to them.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan encounters a surprise visitor who shares some unsolicited advice, leaving him feeling guilty; Darlene welcomes a new employee to Wellman Plastics.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark is stressed and exhausted from studying for an important entrance exam, so Darlene steps in to help, but her plan backfires.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene makes a decision about her trip to Hawaii, leading to a heated encounter with Barb; Becky gives a presentation on addiction to Mark's class.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Two proposals bring big changes to the Conner family; Jackie uses her Jeopardy infamy to her advantage.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners continue to deal with the pandemic while navigating breakups and newfound sobriety, all while planning an upcoming wedding.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: After Ben declines Darlene's proposal, she starts to ponder why she tends to be so negative in life, prompting her to start a journey of self-discovery, which leads to Pastor Phil.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Part of Becky's recovery program mandates she make amends with people she has lied to over the years, leading her to meet up again with a former high school friend.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: It's Dan and Louise's wedding day, but it's a far-from-perfect, especially when a weather report forecasts that a tornado is headed for Lanford creating chaos and surprises.

programme.desc: The Conners are ready for Halloween, despite a leaky roof that forces Dan and Louise to cancel their honeymoon

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene worries about Mark making friends at his new school; Mark turns to Ben for advice; Becky finds herself thriving in college and starts thinking about her future plans.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Jackie devises an offbeat plan to serve the customers at The Lunch Box, it's anything but smooth; Dan begins to sell furniture to make room for his new bride and her things.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: As Louise starts to move in, Dan decides to sell the furniture he bought for Roseanne when they were married; he soon finds parting with the furniture harder than he thought.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene brings Nick to the hardware store, where they run into Ben, who invites Nick to join him at The Lunch Box to watch a Bears game.

programme.desc: The Conners celebrate Mark when he makes Dean's List at his new magnet school; Jackie continues to navigate her relationship with Neville.

programme.desc: Darlene continues to navigate her breakup with Ben; Dan offers to talk with Aldo's dad when he doesn't approve of Harris and Aldo's relationship.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark returns to public school and finds it hard to fit in; Darlene isn't happy when she finds out what Mark's doing to make extra cash for college.

programme.title: The Conners

programme.desc: The family is locked down in their home due to a shooting incident in the neighborhood.

programme.desc: When Becky outs her relationship with Professor Davis, it's his erratic behavior that sends Becky down a path to reevaluate their relationship.

programme.desc: Darlene searches for a home that she and Becky can afford; after an attempt to boost business at The Lunch Box goes awry.

programme.desc: Dan enlists a few friends to help him with the funeral home remodel; Robin and Darlene take a big career risk.

programme.title: The Conners

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Ben and Darlene are excited to share their good news with the family, but Neville and Jackie, and Aldo and Harris, share their own very similar news.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: The Conners gear up for a megawedding; Jackie & Neville, Darlene & Ben, Harris & Aldo are planning for a big day, but discover that some of the couples may not be on the same page.

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Mark is anxious to get his driver's license; Darlene attempts to teach Mark to drive, but her frantic energy sends him running to Ben for help; Harris meets a new guy online.

programme.desc: When a relative passes away unexpectedly, the family must debate about who should gain custody of a jaded nephew, who is just shy of his 18th birthday.

programme.desc: Harris takes a stand on an issue that ruffles a few feathers in Darlene's new neighborhood.

programme.title: 1 vs. 100
programme.desc: Professional dancer Carrie Ann Inaba hosts this show in which a contestant can win $50,000. The contestant, known as the One, competes with a mob of 100 other players by answering questions. When the One answers correctly, each member of the mob that answered incorrectly is eliminated. The One earns money for each mob member who is eliminated. If the One can eliminate the entire mob, he wins $50,000. But if the One gets a question wrong, he is eliminated and the remaining mob members split his winnings.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia
programme.desc: Fashion comes to Wipeout Australia as we meet Adam “God’s Gift” Marshall, a self styled Ad man who conquers the Qualifier. Other Catwalk moments include the Grandpa in his Red Speedos and a Rainbow Bright Personal Ad. If jumping a revolving arm while balancing on a pedestal above water isn’t enough for you then you’ll love this weeks Sweeper. Contestants are armed with Dodgeballs, to be deployed at each other, creating horrific hits and spectacular spills. The Dizzy Dummy claims its first victim as Dummy Tummy rejects a contestant and the Wipeout Zone becomes a battle of young and old.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia
programme.desc: Wipeout Australia debunks the myth that only young, fit and funky people should go on game shows. This week we are forced to take notice of Demolition Dave, a 49 yr old South Australia man who thanks to some home training smashes the qualifier. For those lucky enough to survive the Fly Screen Sweeper it was Dizzy Dummy time. Emerging as the Dark Horse, Kobie Mulligan earned herself a shot in the Wipeout Zone, joined by a Strategist and Rubber Woman resulting in a bitter showdown.

programme.title: Wipeout Australia
programme.desc: From singing Pastors to Wookies, this week is jammed pack with Characters, who battle it out on the Qualifier with amusing attempts at the inconceivable Field Goal Swing. Its no easy task to earn a spot in the Wipeout Zone this week with the Dreadmill, sorting the men from the boys. Contestants must dodge the wrecking ball while shooting basketballs. Although there is one man who came prepared, Dodgeball Champion Dan Bennett, whose “Duck, Dive, Dip, Dodge and Dunk” training comes into play.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: Monty faces some of the most surprising plans yet - a Norwegian garden complete with waterfalls to be fashioned out of a tiny back yard in Dorset, and nothing less than a Japanese tea garden to be created out of a patch of ground in Bromley.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: Monty Don is asked to rescue two nightmare outside spaces. In Salisbury, newly engaged Glenn and Zoe want a brand new garden and most of all they are desperate to produce flowers for their wedding. Currently their steeply sloping garden is completely unusable.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: Monty Don is asked to rescue two nightmare outside spaces. In Salisbury, newly engaged Glenn and Zoe want a brand new garden and most of all they are desperate to produce flowers for their wedding. Currently their steeply sloping garden is completely unusable.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Starting his journey at the sole surviving garden of the 1600s, Levens Hall in Cumbria, Monty sets out to investigate what the gardens of this age would have looked like and what influenced and inspired their creation.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty bases himself at Rousham House in Oxfordshire, designed by one of the first practitioners of the landscape movement, William Kent. It has survived almost unchanged since its completion in 1741.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty Don explores the extraordinary transformations that occurred throughout the 19th century. As a result of an expanding empire, scientific and technological innovation and social change, British gardens became more exotic, more colourful and more widely accessible than ever before.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty Don concludes his journey through Britain's gardening heritage by looking at how the nation's gardens have evolved over the last hundred years. He looks at the profound effect that two world wars had on the attitude to gardens and gardening.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: At Longmeadow, Monty Don celebrates the arrival of summer by making a start on his new scented border, and offers a few suggestions for what to be getting on with this weekend.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don welcomes us to his garden at Longmeadow and offers some tips on keeping our gardens at their best throughout the season. Carol Klein meets wildlife enthusiast Steve Head, to discover more about the wildlife that depend on our garden ponds.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: The first big gardening weekend of the year gets underway with Monty dividing perennials and giving plenty of tips for how we can kick-start the garden for the season ahead. As millions of bedding plants are poised for planting in our pots and borders, Joe Swift visits a major grower to find out how they are produced and what drives the demand.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: With the season well underway, there's plenty of work to be getting on with in the garden at Longmeadow and there's plenty to enjoy too. Monty Don will be undertaking some timely tasks to make sure the garden remains beautiful and productive all summer long. Joe Swift visits a garden transported, lock, stock and barrel to Britain from Japan around a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don makes a start on his new wild flower garden at Longmeadow and at last gets to taste the first new potatoes of the year. He also demonstrates how a radical chop of some border plants now can rejuvenate them for later in the season. Carol Klein celebrates a cottage garden favourite, the foxglove, and Joe Swift drops in on world renowned garden designer, Dan Pearson.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don is busy ensuring that his plants are making the most of the warmth and light, and puts to use the homemade fertilizer he made a few weeks ago. He also catches up with his tomato growing trial to see how the different techniques are performing. Carol Klein gets to grips with flowering dogwoods, perhaps the most aristocratic and elegant of all garden trees, and there's a visit to a magical topiary garden in Kent.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Longmeadow is in full bloom, but Monty Don is keen to remind viewers that there is still time to sow some late vegetables, demonstrating how easy it is to grow salad in a pot. It's time to give wisterias their summer prune. An expert, whose 252ft vine was in full flower just weeks ago, shows how she cuts back that summer growth. Meanwhile, Carol Klein has been out and about in Norfolk to revel in the bearded iris.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty explores the secret life of his garden from the soil organisms underfoot to the birds that soar overhead. Naturalist Simon King shows us the wildlife that depends on our gardens, we visit a small space designed as a haven for garden creatures and Carol celebrates a plant family popular with bees and butterflies.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don explores some of Longmeadow's late-summer highlights and propagates a range of favourite plants for next summer and we meet an artist who has created a very special roof garden where creativity and colour collide.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don makes a start by cutting his hedges and Carol Klein steps back in time when she visits a walled garden in the Scottish Borders.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don tackles the perennial problem of what to grow in the shade beneath a tree, Carol Klein takes a look at the crocosmia and we meet a gardener in Derbyshire who has spent a lifetime growing and showing gladioli.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: The team celebrate the bounty our gardens have to offer at this time of year as Carol Klein gathers wild blackberries, Monty Don is at Longmeadow, and we join a champion vegetable grower in Yorkshire as he prepares for the biggest show of the season.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don tackles autumn lawn maintenance tasks, Carol Klein is looking at burnets, and we meet a man who's dedicated himself to a North American prairie favourite, the echinacea.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty and the team are at RHS Rosemoor in Devon to find out about their fruit trees and sedum collection, and Joe visits Scampston Hall, home of a ten-year experiment in naturalistic planting by garden designer Piet Oudolf.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don harvests apples, pears and quince and plants indoor bulbs, we meet a Northern Irish daffodil breeder, and Carol Klein travels to Wales to explore the Eupatorium with a passionate gardener who has a rare and spectacular collection.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: As autumn unfolds in the garden, Monty Don and Nigel make the most of the season and prepare for the winter ahead. Meanwhile Carol Klein is in Surrey looking at wild and cultivated heathers.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty's dividing his Pulmonaria and gives advice on frost-protection, Joe visits a tropical oasis outside Bristol, and Carol looks at Rowans from around the world.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty gives advice on how to cut and maintain hedges as well as ideas on growing fruit in pots. Also, Nick Bailey travels to the southern tip of Cornwall to seek out a plant which escaped from our gardens.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Adam Frost gives tips on lawn repair, grows some unusual vegetables and plants a seasonal container. Advolly Richmond brings us up to date in her history of lawns by exploring the trend for ever more sophisticated machinery.

programme.title: Monty Don's Paradise Gardens
programme.desc: In Morocco, Monty discovers the wide variety of paradise gardens. He begins just outside the city of Marrakesh in an enormous royal walled meadow, The Agdal. From there he moves to the heart of the town where he comes upon a tiny garden where huge banana plants jostle with palms to create a secret paradise garden, a shelter from the busy world outside. And in another part of the city a rundown old palace has been turned into a stunning contemporary garden with a twist.

programme.title: Monty Don's Paradise Gardens
programme.desc: In Turkey Monty is dazzled by an extraordinary display of the Ottoman Empire's favourite flower, the tulip, and learns of its sacred significance. Travelling further East to India he encounters a new type of spirituality in the tomb gardens of the Mughal Empire. Stunning mausoleums were set in vast gardens as places where an earthly king could enter a divine paradise.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty travels to Europe and explores the influence of the Venetians on gardening. To begin with, he explores Venice on one of the city's famous barges, stepping out to visit green spaces large and small that are often hidden from view behind high walls.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty begins in the city of Trieste, close to Italy's border with Croatia, to visit a public garden first created by an obsessive royal plantsman more than 150 years ago, which is now being carefully restored. He then heads down the Adriatic coast through Croatia to pick up the trail that the Venetians followed, ending his journey on the beautiful island of Lopud, near Dubrovnik.

programme.title: Monty Don's Adriatic Gardens
programme.desc: Monty begins the last leg of his journey in Corfu, a Greek island with strong Venetian links, including olive trees planted by them that are still grown today. Here, Monty visits a spectacular garden made by an Englishman with Greek connections.

programme.title: Monty Don's Japanese Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don returns to Japan during the fiery blaze of autumn. He visits the three great gardens of Japan to learn how they protect the garden from the coming winter and learns how the Japanese are weaving nature into their concrete urban jungle.

programme.title: Monty Don's Japanese Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don returns to Japan during the fiery blaze of autumn. He visits the three great gardens of Japan to learn how they protect the garden from the coming winter and learns how the Japanese are weaving nature into their concrete urban jungle.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Carol Klein is with Billy Carruthers in West Lothian, enjoying his wonderful and varied collection of flamboyant peonies. Joe Swift visits world-renowned opera venue Glyndebourne in Sussex and is given an exclusive tour of their gardens.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty's thoughts turn to spring when he gives recommendations for bulbs to plant that will thrive in pots. He also shows how to prune summer fruiting raspberries. In Norfolk, Frances Tophill visits a gardener who at 97 still gardens every day.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don prepares for his spring display and tackles slippery paths, Carol Klein visits a collection of Michaelmas daisies and we visit a veg grower with a show-stopping Halloween pumpkin.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty has tips and ideas for planting up garden pots to provide a focal point over the winter months, Rachel visits the tulips of Keukenhof, Joe visits Esther Rantzen's much-loved garden, and Carol visits Glebe Cottage.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: This time there's plenty to do to prepare for the season to come and Monty Don is clearing out spent crops and mulching his asparagus. Joe Swift's been to visit keen gardeners, Wayne and Geraldine Hemingway, to see how they combine sustainability with their designer-style. Carol Klein's exploring the history of the rose at Coughton Court, one of our best rose gardens and Monty plants a new rose of his own. What happens when you have to downsize and leave your much-loved garden?

programme.title: Beyond The Surface

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Over a decade after the game changing Longbeard XR was introduced by Winchester, the wait is finally over for their next ground breaking turkey load. After years of perfecting the recipe behind the scenes, Winchester finally unveiled the new Longbeard TSS at a turkey camp in northern Michigan. First watch the jaw dropping Longbeard TSS pattern board testing, then see it go to work on some spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nestled in the hills of Ohio just west of the Appalachians is a very special deer camp ripe with memories from deer season’s past. With the development of the 350 Legend straight-walled cartridge by Winchester in 2019, a world of opportunities now existed in states like Ohio and Michigan. In this episode, with the 350 Legend in hand, three mature whitetails meet their maker, from the same blind, over the course of three seasons.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: It’s been 60 years since AA Tracker was introduced to the shooting sports world. Since that day, an immeasurable number of AA hulls have hit the ground and countless shooters have stood center stage raising a trophy where millions of dollars have been won. Professional and recreational shooters alike have trusted AA for six decades. In this episode, load up for stories of high school, collegiate competitors and the world’s best as they bust clays with the legendary shot shell.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: For the first time in history, the World English Sporting Clays Championship was held in the United States at the incredible M&M Hunting Preserve owned by the Matarese family in New Jersey. Watch as Winchester’s best shooters vie for Gold as they compete against over 2,500 shooters and 17 countries. We’ll also join the Kids and Clays foundation in Florida as they host an event that will most certainly touch your soul.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: In this episode the DCD crew heads to the lesser-known but highly productive Red River in Western Louisiana. Despite a slow start to the season, the Red River provides some of the best hunting yet. With mixed bags of woodies, greenheads, and teal. Not to mention a handful of bonus squirrels and wild mushrooms. Shoot straight and come hungry.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Duck hunting in Louisiana is as much about its history as it is about its future. In the season's final days, Jean-Paul learns about Louisiana’s rich waterfowling history, dives into conservation projects throughout the state, and returns to Bayou Black for one last ride. Shoot straight and come hungry because it's the last hunt of the season.

programme.title: Life On The Water

programme.title: Life On The Water

programme.title: Life On The Water

programme.title: Mighty Bite
programme.desc: The Mighty Bite is the worlds ONLY proven and patented 5-SENSE fishing lure.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: There’s nothing like a change in weather conditions to wreck a perfectly good fishing plan, and that’s exactly what Capt. Justin Leake and his cousin encounter when December turns unseasonably warm. It’s a grey morning with thick fog so Justin and Capt. Brent Berry won’t be heading offshore right away as planned. Instead, Justin turns to his Humminbird CoastMaster charts to pinpoint a near shore artificial reef just five minutes from the St. Andrews Pass, where the anglers will do a little fishing until the fog burns off. Capt. Leake opts to send a jig to the bottom and he’s not very picky about the one that gets tied on. “When fishing reefs, the specific jig doesn’t matter because it’s all about the presentation,” he says. “When you’re sitting on top of a wreck, break out the ‘junk jigs’ – they get bit just fine.” And that proves to be the case as Justin and Brent enjoy non-stop battles against amberjack, red snapper and bonita. And with a bite this good, there’s no reason to go anywhere else! Also, we take a look at the United States Coast Guard Auxiliary’s new paddle craft safety initiative.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Witness a truly epic day on the water when Capt. Justin and Meredith find a secluded slice of beach teeming with redfish biting virtually everything. Topwater plugs, rusty flies and a live well full of bait make for an experience no redfish angler would forget

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: When your gut tells you to do something different than what’s in front of you, do you listen?Capt. Justin and Meredith listen, and find that success comes in many forms. And it turns out that success can be really tasty, too!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: It’s opening day of grouper season and, for Capt. Justin Leake and one of his longtime fishing buddies, that means a trip offshore is in order. And what better way to break in a new boat than heading to some reefs and filling the cooler with one of the Gulf of Mexico’s most popular fish?

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Second leg in the slam is complete! Justin Webb killed his Rio in Texas. Next stop - Tennessee for the Eastern.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Justin Webb heads to Tennessee to hunt with Phillip Culpepper, hoping to get an Eastern in his quest for a Grand Slam. Next stop - Wyoming for a Merriam.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Rusty Creasey joins the Spring Thunder crew for an incredible turkey hunt in Oklahoma. The guys are blessed to fill 6 tags in a short time and have several memorable hunts.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Michael Pitts of Realtree Road Trips joins Anthony Virga and Matt Garger hunting the hills of New York.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Justin and Brandi with Big Dreams Outdoors finish up their slam hunting Merriam turkeys with 7J Outfitters in Wyoming. It was a tough week for Justin but persistence pays off!

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Mike heads to Table Rock Lake to meet up with Trenton and his family. Even battling the tough fishing conditions following a heavy front, there’s never a lack of family time, laughs or friendly competitions with the Southards.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton is headed to meet up with Andrew Norbye on Lake Guntersville in Alabama. With not a lot of current being pulled, the deep schools weren’t set up to feed. So they went up shallow to fish grass until evening time when the ledge fish really started biting.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Ca heads to Murrells Inlet, SC for some low country lure slingin'. What's on your menu? Shrimp and grits or Flounder?

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Ca Fishes in his home waters for probably the most powerful inshore fish, the gag grouper.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Road trip time! Embrace the frigid temps with CA on this special episode, fishing for the cape Fear Slam.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: CA fishes with Richard Black in Islamorada. This guy can do it all. Rain or shine, no fish is safe.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is joined by his son Dillan for a plug-filled day in their local waters of Cedar Key, FL!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is in Stuart, FL. Joined by 16-year-old angler, Denton Potter. The two are targeting the local bridge dwelling giants, while going “Beyond The Surface” into Denton’s story.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Over a decade after the game changing Longbeard XR was introduced by Winchester, the wait is finally over for their next ground breaking turkey load. After years of perfecting the recipe behind the scenes, Winchester finally unveiled the new Longbeard TSS at a turkey camp in northern Michigan. First watch the jaw dropping Longbeard TSS pattern board testing, then see it go to work on some spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nestled in the hills of Ohio just west of the Appalachians is a very special deer camp ripe with memories from deer season’s past. With the development of the 350 Legend straight-walled cartridge by Winchester in 2019, a world of opportunities now existed in states like Ohio and Michigan. In this episode, with the 350 Legend in hand, three mature whitetails meet their maker, from the same blind, over the course of three seasons.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: It’s been 60 years since AA Tracker was introduced to the shooting sports world. Since that day, an immeasurable number of AA hulls have hit the ground and countless shooters have stood center stage raising a trophy where millions of dollars have been won. Professional and recreational shooters alike have trusted AA for six decades. In this episode, load up for stories of high school, collegiate competitors and the world’s best as they bust clays with the legendary shot shell.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: For the first time in history, the World English Sporting Clays Championship was held in the United States at the incredible M&M Hunting Preserve owned by the Matarese family in New Jersey. Watch as Winchester’s best shooters vie for Gold as they compete against over 2,500 shooters and 17 countries. We’ll also join the Kids and Clays foundation in Florida as they host an event that will most certainly touch your soul.
Clay and Crystal Charlton of Take-Em Outfitters are after everything big in Alberta! Giant Lake Trout, Monster Black Bear and Big Muleys!

programme.title: Global Getaway
programme.desc: This week on Getaway our favorite foodie Poh Ling Yeow is enjoying a wonderful wintery cruise through Europe’s Christmas Markets, taste-testing all the delicious festive treats.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Finally, the 2021 turkey season is here. The earliest turkey that is legal to hunt is in South Florida, and that's where Phillip Culpepper and the guys are headed. Things get up close and personal on the first morning of the season.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is joined by Capt. Jake Bates as the two fish Jake’s local waters of North Florida. Redfish is the targeted species, but the tide doesn’t wait on anyone around these parts…

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve start the season with Capt Scott Stoky chasing Islamorada Tunas and Mahis offshore out of Plantation Boat Mart

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve catch a mixed bag bottom fishing off of Islamorada with Captain Scott Stoky.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve go yellow tailing out of Hawks Cay for a limit of tasty yellowtail snapper and Steve picks a battle with a big lemon shark.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve bounce around the reefs out of Hawks Cay catching a wide variety of reef dwellers.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve take their brand new Invincible 36’ out of Plantation Boat Mart to fly the kites for some early season sailfishing

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve make a big run from Plantation Boat Mart in the Invincible 36’into the green Gulf waters to fill the Yeti cooler and battle with some seas monsters.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Capt. Mike heads to Venice, LA, to explore a unique bayou technique —beach fishing for redfish and black drum in the heart of the Gulf.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Capt. Blair & Capt. John Beach are at it again, in Crystal River catching some great snook right off the mouth of the river.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark is still on the South Island of New Zealand chasing the Wingshooting Slam. It’s Mark's last day to complete the waterfowl portion of the slam and he still needs a Black Swan and a Shoveler. This hunt is taking place on a freshwater lake right off the ocean. The temperature is unusually warm for this time of year, but thankfully that hasn’t affected the numbers of birds around.

programme.title: Upland Nation
programme.desc: Get ready to shoot with the “ready position.”

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Louisiana’s Cajun Ninja joins Chef Jay Ducote in our latest catch-and-cook adventure. Tag along as they hit up the hottest fishing spots in Plaquemines Parish with Captain Shane York and turn their catches into authentic Cajun meals.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: In this episode the DCD crew heads to the lesser-known but highly productive Red River in Western Louisiana. Despite a slow start to the season, the Red River provides some of the best hunting yet. With mixed bags of woodies, greenheads, and teal. Not to mention a handful of bonus squirrels and wild mushrooms. Shoot straight and come hungry.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Duck hunting in Louisiana is as much about its history as it is about its future. In the season's final days, Jean-Paul learns about Louisiana’s rich waterfowling history, dives into conservation projects throughout the state, and returns to Bayou Black for one last ride. Shoot straight and come hungry because it's the last hunt of the season.

programme.title: Captain's Log
programme.desc: Capt. Jonathan Moss ventures to South Florida with the hope of having a few Exotic Encounters.

programme.title: Captain's Log
programme.desc: Despite adverse conditions, Capt. Jonathan Moss and long time friend, Capt. Adam Whitson, are heading out on the water in search of the Crystal River Inshore Slam.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon takes outdoorsman Zac Yarbrough to look for blackfin tuna and then out deep for swordfish. They are joined by Styles Haury for some epic offshore action.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Renowned Kiteboarder Mike Walsh goes out on a windy day with Brandon to see what they can catch around the iconic lighthouses of the middle Keys.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Get to know one extraordinary person who works on the show as we go fishing with underwater cameraman and boat captain himself, Garrett Stephens.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Jared Dieguz has been fishing all his life and now that he's running his own charter business, finding a day to "scout" the sea is more important than ever.

programme.title: Mighty Bite
programme.desc: The Mighty Bite is the worlds ONLY proven and patented 5-SENSE fishing lure.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: There’s nothing like a change in weather conditions to wreck a perfectly good fishing plan, and that’s exactly what Capt. Justin Leake and his cousin encounter when December turns unseasonably warm. It’s a grey morning with thick fog so Justin and Capt. Brent Berry won’t be heading offshore right away as planned. Instead, Justin turns to his Humminbird CoastMaster charts to pinpoint a near shore artificial reef just five minutes from the St. Andrews Pass, where the anglers will do a little fishing until the fog burns off. Capt. Leake opts to send a jig to the bottom and he’s not very picky about the one that gets tied on. “When fishing reefs, the specific jig doesn’t matter because it’s all about the presentation,” he says. “When you’re sitting on top of a wreck, break out the ‘junk jigs’ – they get bit just fine.” And that proves to be the case as Justin and Brent enjoy non-stop battles against amberjack, red snapper and bonita. And with a bite this good, there’s no reason to go anywhere else! Also, we take a look at the United States Coast Guard Auxiliary’s new paddle craft safety initiative.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Witness a truly epic day on the water when Capt. Justin and Meredith find a secluded slice of beach teeming with redfish biting virtually everything. Topwater plugs, rusty flies and a live well full of bait make for an experience no redfish angler would forget

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: When your gut tells you to do something different than what’s in front of you, do you listen?Capt. Justin and Meredith listen, and find that success comes in many forms. And it turns out that success can be really tasty, too!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: It’s opening day of grouper season and, for Capt. Justin Leake and one of his longtime fishing buddies, that means a trip offshore is in order. And what better way to break in a new boat than heading to some reefs and filling the cooler with one of the Gulf of Mexico’s most popular fish?

programme.desc: During a summer in Nantucket, a recent high school grad with dreams of being a cartoonist helps a young singer save her family home from developers.

programme.desc: Two complete misfits aspire to spy for the CIA.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: After shooting her boyfriend, she meets the hitman who had been planning to kill him. As the two dispose of his body, romantic sparks begin to fly.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: What begins as a casual chat turns into something more complex, as a romance blooms between a high school junior and a senior on his way to college.

programme.title: These Old Broads
programme.desc: After their 1960’s movie becomes a revival hit, three aging and bickering stars are given a chance to join forces for a one-time televised concert.

programme.title: Wind
programme.desc: The open seas are ripe for adventure and romance as a man does his best to win the America’s Cup for the U.S. in a string of yacht races.

programme.title: Nadine
programme.desc: While recovering sexy photos of herself from a dishonest photographer, a woman witnesses a murder and finds herself at the center of a conspiracy.

programme.title: The Master of Disguise
programme.desc: A waiter at his father’s Italian restaurant possesses an inherited talent for mimicry and learns how to use it to take on multiple identities.

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: Two mismatched partners, a pro boxer and a federal spy, must avoid international intrigue and deadly traps in order to get back an expensive jet.

programme.title: Stealing Harvard
programme.desc: A home health-care exec under the thumb of his fiancée’s father is forced into petty crime to finance his niece's first year in the Ivy Leagues.

programme.title: The Principal
programme.desc: After taking a bat to the Porsche of his ex-wife’s divorce attorney, teacher Rick Latimer is punished with a principal post at a violent high school.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and James Garner star as 1920s legends, actor Tom Mix and crimefighter Wyatt Earp, who join forces to solve a Beverly Hills killing.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: Tells the story of a charming stranger, Hal Carter, who drifts into a small Kansas town and immediately disrupts the everyday lives of its residents.

programme.title: Buddy
programme.desc: In this charming adaptation of Gertrude Lintz's autobiography, a brave, loving, eccentric socialite attempts to raise an 800-pound gorilla as her son.

programme.title: Dancer, Texas: Pop. 81
programme.desc: Four graduating high schoolers contemplate their future lives, deciding whether or not to leave their town of Dancer, Texas to move to Los Angeles.

programme.title: Double Platinum
programme.desc: Years after she abandoned her baby girl, a famous singer must face her now teenage daughter and repair their complicated relationship.

programme.title: Wedding Wars
programme.desc: A gay party planner agrees to organize the nuptials for his straight brother until he finds out that he is behind a speech against gay marriage.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: During a hiking trip, the President's daughter gets kidnapped. Now it is up to Agent McGregor and a river guide to rescue her before it is too late.

programme.title: First Target
programme.desc: A group of deadly assassins targets the US President as he tours a state park aboard a tram, and it's up to Secret Service agent, Alex, to stop them.

programme.title: First Shot
programme.desc: A sniper's bullet has left the President in critical condition. Now a secret service agent must track down the terrorists behind the attack.

programme.title: S.I.S.
programme.desc: An elite police squad hunts down the worst criminals in Los Angeles, but they may have met their match when they track a notorious, volatile killer.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: Family rivalries, secrets, and the appearance of a mysterious stranger threaten to undermine a young man’s effort to give his father a proper funeral.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: Based on the play by William Inge.

programme.title: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: In this suspenseful comedy, Nancy Troy (Loretta Young) and her mystery-author husband, Jeff (Brian Aherne), move into a dark basement apartment in New York City's Greenwich Village, in hopes of stirring up writing inspiration. When their neighbors begin acting oddly and one of them turns up dead, Nancy and Jeff must uncover a murder mystery in their own building, with a number of suspects lurking about, including the creepy Mrs. Devoe (Gale Sondergaard).

programme.title: Diamond Head
programme.desc: A wealthy Hawaiian pineapple plantation owner and bigoted bully with political ambitions flatly refuses to allow his young sister to marry a native.

programme.title: Meet the Stewarts
programme.desc: When a boy from modest means marries his rich, pampered finacé, squabbles over budget threaten to tear the lovebirds apart in this charming rom-com.

programme.title: Gidget (1959)
programme.desc: Things turn around for a sad-faced teen who can’t measure up to the chesty, bikini babes on the beach when two surfers start paying her attention.

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: This Academy Award winner for Best Picture tells the story of an idealistic Southern politician brought down by his own ambition and lust for power.

programme.title: Don't Raise the Bridge, Lower the River
programme.desc: A daydreamer enlists the help of his British con artist friend to steal and sell the plans for a valuable new oil drill in this spy thriller spoof.

programme.title: American Madness
programme.desc: During the Depression, the bank owned by generous Dickson (Walter Huston) is barely staying afloat, and things get worse when $100,000 is lifted from the vault. Fingers are pointed at reformed crook Matt (Pat O'Brien), who got a job and a fresh start from Dickson. The innocent Matt can clear his name by admitting that on the night of the robbery he was breaking up a tryst between Dickson's wife and another teller. But this revelation may crush Dickson, and Matt's conscience plays tug-of-war.

programme.title: Three for the Show
programme.desc: Widowed by World War I, a Broadway star remarries her late husband's songwriting partner only to have the first one turn up very much alive.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Wooed by a Pittsburgh socialite, an idealistic doctor from a mining town is torn between helping his community and lucrative work at an elite clinic.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A stranded group of six Allied soldiers trek across the desert, making their way to an abandoned fort, but are soon faced with a German battalion.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: The prince's quest for revenge becomes his undoing when his suspicion is confirmed that his uncle killed his father to win the throne and his mother.

programme.title: Queen Bee
programme.desc: A naive, working-class Chicagoan enters a world of bitter jealousy and manipulative power plays when invited to Atlanta by her socialite elder cousin.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: When a kerfuffle over fine wine exports upends their tiny nation's economy, the prime minister and grand duchess of Fenwick declare war on the U.S.

programme.title: Let No Man Write My Epitaph
programme.desc: Nick Romano (James Darren) lives in a poor tenement building on the south side of Chicago with his well-meaning but drug-addicted mother, Nellie (Shelley Winters). She encourages him to pursue his piano-playing talent in hopes that it will bring him a better life. Nellie's neighbors, like the alcoholic ex-lawyer (Burl Ives) who secretly loves her, help her in keeping Nick away from Louie, the resident drug dealer. But a chance meeting between Nick and Louie could change things forever.

programme.title: Girls Can Play
programme.desc: A detective investigates the murder of a player on a professional girl's softball team.

programme.title: The Ambushers
programme.desc: When an experimental flying saucer is brought down in Mexico, secret agent Matt Helm is sent to find it and keep it from falling into enemy hands.

programme.title: Our Man in Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited as a spy by the British secret service. Despite his phony reports and lies, he quickly gains importance.

programme.title: Good Neighbor Sam
programme.desc: A happily married advertising agent helps out his single neighbor by posing as her husband so she can inherit a 15 million dollar fortune.

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: Returning to Fort Lincoln, Capt. Benson learns of Custer's defeat at the Little Big Horn. At the inquiry as Custer's officers blame Custer for the defeat, Benson tries to defend him. However, Benson was suspiciously absent at the time of the battle and is now despised by the troops. So when an order to retrieve the bodies from the battlefield arrives, Benson volunteers for the dangerous mission of returning back into Indian territory.

programme.title: Ambush at Tomahawk Gap
programme.desc: Flaming arrows stop four ex-convicts searching a ghost town for their buried loot.

programme.title: Seminole Uprising
programme.desc: An Army lieutenant (George Montgomery) is ordered to go after Florida Indians in Texas.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wounded rancher (Randolph Scott) hides with a schoolmarm (Ellen Drew) after his ex-girlfriend's husband (Alexander Knox) runs him out of town.

programme.title: The Parson and the Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Anthony Dexter) retires from the outlaw life, fakes his own death and adopts the name William Bonney. Soon, William runs into Jack Slade (Sonny Tufts), a gun-toting stranger who is itching for a gunfight. Jack falls in with a group of thugs terrorizing William's town. The Rev. Jericho Jones (Buddy Rogers) exhorts William to defend the townspeople, and, when William's maid, Tonya (Marie Windsor), is beaten by the thugs, he grabs his pistol.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: When a rancher dies during a feud with a big oil company, his daughter takes revenge by digging her own wells, assisted by an expert and a friend.

programme.title: The Stranger Wore a Gun
programme.desc: After the Civil War, a spy for the Confederacy absconds to Arizona to start a new life but gets reluctantly pulled into a stagecoach gold robbery.

programme.title: Terror Trail
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) heads off a range war over cattle and sheep.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small western community turn on Jim Guthrie (Dana Andrews) when he becomes the prime suspect for a murder he didn't commit. Before getting a chance to prove his innocence, Jim is driven from his home and into the wilderness, where he is left for dead. Despite the danger, he comes back years later, discovering that he's still a wanted man. But a kindhearted local named Chris (Dianne Foster) believes his story, and together they begin a desperate search for the true culprit.

programme.title: Gun Fury
programme.desc: California-bound rancher Ben Warren (Rock Hudson) is shot and left for dead when a demented ex-Confederate, Frank Slayton (Phil Carey), kidnaps his Southern bride-to-be (Donna Reed). Revived, Ben sets out to rescue her. Along the way, he picks up Jess Burgess (Leo Gordon), a slighted former member of Slayton's gang, and American Indian local Johash (Pat Hogan), who has his own beef with the outlaws. Together they embark on a perilous chase toward the Mexican border to stop Slayton.

programme.title: The Black Dakotas
programme.desc: A Confederate plot to turn the Sioux against the Union crumbles when a double agent makes off with a shipment of gold.

programme.title: Texas Cyclone
programme.desc: A traveling cowboy visits an unusual town where everyone assumes he is a man who was once presumed to be dead, including the man’s wife.

programme.title: Wyoming Renegades
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Phil Carey) and his girlfriend (Martha Hyer) cannot start over until they stop Butch Cassidy's (Gene Evans) gang.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: Dr. Allen Seward (Robert Francis) is the new doctor at a remote Army outpost. His liberal attitudes towards Native Americans become a source of tension between him and his superiors, especially Capt. Peter Blake (Philip Carey), who regards all Native Americans as dangerous and untrustworthy. Seward's insistence on treating several local Kiowa tribespeople for malaria further enrages Blake, who deems Seward a traitor when the Kiowa join forces with the Comanches and attack the fort.

programme.title: 40 Guns to Apache Pass
programme.desc: A cavalry captain (Audie Murphy) rescues settlers and catches a corporal (Kenneth Tobey) selling rifles to Apaches.

programme.title: Whirlwind Raiders
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) stop bogus Texas lawmen.

programme.title: The New Daughters of Joshua Cabe
programme.desc: While posing as his daughters, three women discover an elderly homesteader has been falsely imprisoned for murder and hatch a plot to smuggle him out.

programme.title: Cyclone Fury
programme.desc: The Durango Kid puts the skids on a bandit bent on sabotaging an Indian's bid for a government contract.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: Former Union soldier John Parrish (Glenn Ford) wants to sell his ranch and start a new life by settling down out east. However, the ruthless tactics of Lew Wilkison (Edward G. Robinson), the scheming businessman interested in his property, make Parrish reconsider the move, especially after one of his ranch hands is murdered. Adding to the increasingly tense conflict is Wilkison's wife, Martha (Barbara Stanwyck), who is cheating on her husband with his brother, Cole (Brian Keith).

programme.title: Savage Pampas
programme.desc: To tame the plains of Argentina, dominated by bandits and Indigenous warriors, an army captain brings in a party of women to keep his soldiers happy.

programme.title: Adventures in Silverado
programme.desc: Based on the Robert Louis Stevenson book "The Silverado Squatters."

programme.title: Decision at Sundown
programme.desc: Bart and sidekick Sam arrive in Sundown on the wedding day of town boss Tate Kimbrough, whom Bart blames for his wife's death years earlier.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Day Zero
programme.desc: Ex-elite soldier escapes prison into a world plagued by a deadly virus, racing undead hordes to reunite with his estranged family.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: A laborer moves to Shanghai to become rich, and has to use his kung-fu skills to survive.

programme.title: Crazy Fist
programme.desc: Years after retiring, a former MMA champion has no choice but to step back in the ring when his best friend dies under suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: The Final Master
programme.desc: A Wing Chun practitioner must defeat eight martial arts academies before he can open his own school.

programme.title: Fight Back to School

programme.desc: Evidence suggests that the man responsible for saving a lieutenant's life is a soldier who was captured in Afghanistan.

programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and the team uncover a domestic drug ring -- led by Sonja's childhood friend, Marion Watkins (Samaire Armstrong), that is producing cocaine.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.desc: Agent Brody sees a connection between the case of a sailor struck by a party bus and the death of her sister; the team gets ready for the city's St. Patrick's Day celebrations.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Pride's daughter is attacked on campus, the team finds a surveillance van loaded with pictures of the special agent's every move.
